articles.description: All eyes will be on Team GB's Bruce Mouat, Grant Hardie, Hammy McMillan and Bobby Lammie on Saturday (18:05 GMT) when they take on Canada with a gold medal at stake at the Winter Olympics.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Four men, one aim - to end 102-year wait for curling gold

articles.description: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany says Jose Mourinho made a "huge mistake" with his "unacceptable" post-match comments after the alleged racial abuse of Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr.
articles.title: Mourinho made 'unacceptable, huge mistake' - Kompany

articles.description: Ukraine's Elina Svitolina beats world number four Coco Gauff to set up a final against American Jessica Pegula at the Dubai Tennis Championships.
articles.title: Coco Gauff: American beaten in epic as Elina Svitolina reaches Dubai final

articles.description: "Wonderfully different" Henry Pollock will start his first England Test in Saturday's must-win Six Nations game against Ireland.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: 'Generational' Henry Pollock ready for first England start against England

articles.description: Cameron Menzies says he has come close to "wrapping" up his darts career as the hand injury he suffered punching a drinks table at the PDC World Championship has left him with "no feeling" in the fingers of his right hand.
articles.title: Cameron Menzies 'came close to quitting' darts after table-punching injury

articles.description: Preparation, training, and belief - after Keely Hodgkinson smashes the indoor 800m world record, her coach Jenny Meadows explains how their plan came together.
articles.title: Keely Hodgkinson: How Olympic champion broke indoor 800m world record

articles.description: As pre-season testing reaches its conclusion, which teams look best - and worst - placed ahead of the Australian Grand Prix?
articles.title: F1 pre-season testing: Who are winners and losers?

articles.description: Australia depart the T20 World Cup with a thumping, nine-wicket consolation victory over Oman in Pallekele.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Australia depart with thumping win over Oman

articles.description: Brazil's all-time record goalscorer Neymar says he is considering retiring at the end of the year and admits it will be a "huge challenge" to make his country's World Cup squad.
articles.title: Neymar: Brazil striker considering retiring at end of year

articles.description: Ireland hope to pull off a major upset and deliver a statement Six Nations win over England in Saturday's showdown at Allianz Stadium.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Ireland plot England upset with title hopes on the line
